sql:
SELECT
	p.project_id,
	p.project_name,
	u.id AS designer_id,
	u.fullname AS designer_name,
	ph.phase_id,
	ph.phase_code,
	CASE ph.phase_code
    WHEN 'TF'     THEN 'Test Fit'
    WHEN 'SD'     THEN 'Schematic Design'
    WHEN 'QA_QC1' THEN 'QA/QC1'
    WHEN 'DD'     THEN 'Design Development'
    WHEN 'QA_QC2' THEN 'QA/QC2'
    WHEN 'PP'     THEN 'P&P'
  END AS phase_label,
	ph.due_date,
	DATEDIFF(ph.due_date, CURDATE()) AS days_until_due
FROM
	design_phases AS ph
	INNER JOIN design_projects AS p ON p.project_id = ph.project_id
	INNER JOIN eviz_users AS u ON u.id = p.designer_id
WHERE
ph.due_date <= DATE_ADD(
  CURDATE(),
  INTERVAL (SELECT CAST(setting_value AS SIGNED)
            FROM design_v7_settings WHERE setting_key='dashboard_days_ahead') DAY
)
ORDER BY
	u.fullname,
	ph.due_date
name: design_projects view

fields.name: phase_label
fields.sqlExpression:
CASE ph.phase_code
    WHEN 'TF'     THEN 'Test Fit'
    WHEN 'SD'     THEN 'Schematic Design'
    WHEN 'QA_QC1' THEN 'QA/QC1'
    WHEN 'DD'     THEN 'Design Development'
    WHEN 'QA_QC2' THEN 'QA/QC2'
    WHEN 'PP'     THEN 'P&P'
  END
